stages.name: Project Setup
stages.description: Initialize project with Jira epic, tickets, and team notifications

stages.name: Code Analysis & Planning
stages.description: Analyze source code and create migration plan

stages.name: Sprint Planning
stages.description: Plan migration work across sprints

stages.name: Code Migration
stages.description: Migrate code from source to target framework

stages.name: Validation & Fix
stages.description: Validate migrated code and fix issues

stages.name: Deployment Preparation
stages.description: Prepare for deployment with CI/CD setup

stages.name: Sprint Review & Retrospective
stages.description: Review progress and conduct retrospective

stages.name: Project Closure
stages.description: Generate final reports and close project
